Translate Vanilla OS

Translate Vanilla OS into your language.

Projects

The following table lists the projects repositories that are available for translation.

Project Repository Translations
First Setup GitHub Weblate
Installer GitHub Weblate
Control Center GitHub Weblate
Drivers Utility GitHub Weblate
PRIME Utility GitHub Weblate
Apx GitHub Weblate
ABRoot GitHub Weblate
VSO GitHub Not yet available
Ikaros GitHub Weblate
Documentation GitHub Instructions
Website GitHub Not yet available
